title: Arithmetic of 2-regular partitions with distinct odd parts
abstract:
Let $pod_2(n)$ denote the number of $2$-regular partitions of $n$ with
distinct odd parts (even parts are unrestricted). In this article, we obtain
congruences for $pod_2(n)$ mod $2$ and mod $8$ using some generating function
manipulations and the theory of Hecke eigenform.
